verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14601'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
وَأَخْرَجَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14602'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.translation: И на поверхность бремя тяжкое свое извергнет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَالَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14603'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2732'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نُ مَا لَهَا
verses.translation: И возгласит (в отчаянии) человек: "Что происходит с ней

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَئِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14604'>ذٍ ت</tajweed>ُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
verses.translation: В тот День Свое известие она объявит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بِأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.translation: Как было ей открыто Господом ее

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَئِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14605'>ذٍ ي</tajweed>َصْدُرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14606'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسُ أَشْتَا<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14607'>تًا ل</tajweed>ِّيُرَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَعْمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَهُمْ
verses.translation: И двинутся В тот День Раздельными толпами люди, И им предстанет все содеянное ими на земле

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8855'>َن ي</tajweed>َعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14608'>رًا ي</tajweed>َرَهُۥ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Famay ya'mal miṡqāla żarratin khairay yarah(ū).
verses.translation: И тот, кто сотворил добро величиной с пылинку, Узрит его

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3112'>َن ي</tajweed>َعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14609'>ةٍ ش</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14610'>ًّا ي</tajweed>َرَهُۥ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa may ya'mal miṡqāla żarratin syarray yarah(ū).
verses.translation: Узрит и тот, кто зло величиной с пылинку совершил
